name: Encryptedblog
body:
### Welcome
Completely encrypts blog posts so that even with access to the WordPress database your posts will be private. To install download zip from GitHub, upload zip to WordPress through admin panel. You are best off renaming the folder in the directory to EncryptedBlog so you can just reupload it update the plugin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
